    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PwCoreModule getInstance()
        Return an instance of this module.
        Returns:
        An instance of this module.

      • registerGoogleApiClient

        public void registerGoogleApiClient(GoogleApiClient googleApiClient)
        Register a GoogleApiClient. This must not be null and it is recommended that the client already be connected when this is called. Unregister with a call to unregisterGoogleApiClient(GoogleApiClient).

        *NOTE*: A reference to the Google Play services library must be included in order to call this.

        Parameters:
        googleApiClient - The GoogleApiClient to register.

      • unregisterGoogleApiClient

        public void unregisterGoogleApiClient(GoogleApiClient googleApiClient)
        Unregister a GoogleApiClient. This may be called at any time and does nothing if the parameter is null. Register a client with a call to registerGoogleApiClient(GoogleApiClient).

        *NOTE*: A reference to the Google Play services library must be included in order to call this.

        Parameters:
        googleApiClient - GoogleApiClient to unregister.

      • getGoogleApiClient

        public GoogleApiClient getGoogleApiClient()
                                   throws NoClassDefFoundError
        Return the currently registered GoogleApiClient. This assumes only one is registered at a time.

        *NOTE*: A reference to the Google Play services library must be included in order to call this.

        Returns:
        A GoogleApiClient or null if none are registered.
        Throws:
        NoClassDefFoundError

        public void setContext(android.content.Context context)
